name: Tupã
description:
Feltier, a wizard with wicked intentions of sorcery, imprisoned the pearls birds, whose creatures when assembled, can repel the sorcerer's spells . One of these creatures appeared in dream for a native boy named Tupã and asked for help. When Tupã awoke and saw the footprints mentioned in the dream, he realized that something real was happening and decided to go looking for the pearls birds.

Explore the lands where Tupã lives.
Run and jump to continue the quest.
Shoot arrows to face enemies and destroy obstacles.
Find the keys to free the pearls birds.

Inventory items, such as Trading Cards, will be available in the future.
